oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sidewalk Construction at James Robertson Parkway and 4th Avenue North, 1959
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of sidewalk construction at the intersection of James Robertson Parkway and 4th Avenue North, 11 May 1959. The area was part of the Capitol Hill Redevelopment Project (Parcel "B-1"). The Cordell Hull State Office Building is visible in the background. Photographed by Hassell Wolfe of the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.); Cordell Hull State Office Building (Nashville, Tenn.);
